release.action:
Refactored testing - one class for tests and abstract class with technical methods for calculating time, that is why now tests are much more readable.
Expected messages are loaded from properties files, which gives you an easy way to add new languages and fixes in tests.
Languages provided (in alphabetical order): Czech, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian,Polish, Spanish
One consistent constructor for all types of calculators using JDK 1.5 varargs. Finnish version added.
Instead of creating many classes (one for each language) you can use JDK 1.5 enums not to duplicate code.
Dutch, French, German, Italian and Spanish version
Stable version of English- and PolishTimeDifferenceCalculator
